markdownRemark.html:
What is Unsplash.com?

Found several excellent photos and images on Unsplash.com, looks like a modern Flickr. Happy to add to my site resources, in addition to my own attempts at design.

Here's attribution for the post image, a dramatic pic of the pyramids in Giza, Egypt in the middle of a sandstorm,

Photo by Gaurav D Lathiya on Unsplash

From Unsplash.com, Unsplash grants you an irrevocable, nonexclusive, worldwide copyright license to download, copy, modify, distribute, perform, and use photos from Unsplash for free, including for commercial purposes, without permission from or attributing the photographer or Unsplash. This license does not include the right to compile photos from Unsplash to replicate a similar or competing service.
